Params: {2: 'Camu', 3: 'Heh. Guess it was worth tryna get near the surface.'}
{2: 'Camu', 3: "I'm now in... I don't even know where I am."}
{2: 'Camu', 3: "I think I have a hatch to the surface here before me, but it ain't budging from my end."}
{2: 'Karenina', 3: "I just pulled the building standard reference of Venus Splash Park from the Ferris wheel terminal. I've roughly figured out the design system this whole place runs on.", 4: '1'}

{2: 'Karenina', 3: 'According to the reference, the hatches in this area are all installed on the ground end of the rotating mechanism. They have pyrotechnic fasteners for emergency activation.', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Karenina', 3: 'This kinda run-of-the-mill control system should a cakewalk for you to crack, yeah?', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Karenina', 3: 'Alright then! Access the network through the signature code I just sent you, and hack into the control system...', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Karenina', 3: "Yo, that's pretty quick! Nice job, Lee!", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Karenina', 3: "Okay, now we'll just have to input a manual overload command here...", 4: '2'}
{3: 'You hear alarm bells ring in the park, followed by a dull explosion.'}
{2: 'Karenina', 3: "The hatch should be blown open. What's left is... to hope that we blew open the right one.", 4: '2'}
